participant_1.background:
I don't talk to my family anymore.
i like cosplay.
i love cabins in the woods on the lake.
i go to craft shows on the weekends.
I like listening to folk metal and riding my boat.

participant_2.background:
I am a homebody who treasures my vintage clothing.
i do not like when people get too close to me.
my grandma raised me.
I love to make tasty carrot soup in my spare time.
i like thomas the tank engine.

content.text: Hey! I hope you are having a good night.
Hey! I am! How are you?
I am doing well! I am in the process of making a cosplay costume.
That's so cool! What kind of cosplay are you making?
I am making a costume of Geralt of Rivia from The Witcher.
Oh wow! That sounds like an awesome costume. I love The Witcher!
Thanks! I am excited to finish it.
I am sure it will look great! I love seeing cosplays.
Me too! I love seeing people's creative interpretations of characters.
Me too! I wish I was more creative. I can't even draw.
You don't have to be creative to cosplay! You just need to have fun and be yourself.
Thanks for the encouragement! I might try cosplaying one day.
You should! It's a lot of fun.
